transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Hello?
Executive: Ji, hello.
Customer: Ji, good afternoon. Ujjwal ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Ujjwal ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji, ji, ji, ji, sir.
Customer: Ujjwal ji, Pankaj baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se manager.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji, sir.
Customer: Actually aapke abhi account manager jo assign hue hai Vineet, unhone bataya ki aapko ek problem aa raha hai mails ka IndiaMART ke.
Hmm hmm. Hai na?
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Customer: Wo problem nahi hai sir, wo to customer ka detail share kar rahe hai aapke sath mein.
Executive: Details share kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha, aap dekhiye na usme jab aap open kar rahe hai buyer detail aa raha hai na karke, number aa raha hai, contact details aa raha hai. Aur jis team se aapne liya hoga service, usme unhone bataya hoga teen tarike se customer hum aapko dete hai. First ho gaya buylead aap consume karte ho, fir aapko number milta hai customer ka. Lekin usme full limited buyleads, 17 buyleads bola hoga, 10 weekly aur one daily bonus buylead hai na?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Usme aapka buylead ka balance lagta hai har buylead pe. Second way ho gaya ki jo samne se is tarike se inquiries aa jayengi, yaha pe aapka buylead ka balance consume nahi hoga. Seedha aapko number mil jayega customer ka, kyuki customer response show kar raha hai aapki profile pe. Thik hai? Third tarika ho gaya aapko directly customer call kar lega.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: To in teeno tarike se aapko customers ke number milte hai. To yaha pe aap customer se baat karenge, unse puchoge aapka kuch inquiry tha, requirement post kiya tha aapne buylead IndiaMART pe. To mai is company se baat kar raha hu. Aap mujhe batayenge ki kya aapko chahiye kya nahi. Fir jo bhi aap apna quotation vagaira dete ho, us tarike se aap customer se baat karenge.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: To isme aap aapke account mein hone ke...
Executive: Ha, boliye.
Customer: But ek hi, ek hi mail, jo mail hai mai batata hu aapko ek baar.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Jo hamare paas lead abhi aayi hai. Jaise buyer details of Telegram ad services, buyer details for Vens Marts solution software chahiye. Buyer details Telegram member add ke naam se, buyer details of performance management chahiye. Buyer details for YouTube manager monetization chahiye. Buyer details of affiliated marketing services chahiye.
Customer: Ha, wo mai batata hu kya hai. Aapke catalog hai na jo aapne mobile se open karte ho, system se bhi open karke dekha hai abhi tak aapne?
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mai puch raha hu, mobile se open kiya hai ya system se bhi kiya hai abhi tak aapne?
Executive: System se bhi, mobile se hi kiya hai, system se.
Customer: Mobile se kiya hai na, to mai bata deta hu jo IndiaMART se aapne service liya hai na sir, ye hamara har tarike se link hota hai. Matlab usme kya aata hai aapko, aapko har jagah pe humne access de diya add karne ka. Basically agar aapke paas aapka koi YouTube vagaira run kar rahe ho na channel, uska access de diya ki aap apni wo video apne catalog mein add kar sakte ho. Affiliated marketing hota hai jaise man lijiye aapka koi Facebook ka page ya kuch aur run kar raha hai, aap uska link bhi apne catalog mein post kar sakte ho. Thik hai? Aur dusra aur kya bataya aap YouTube aur iske affiliated marketing ke alawa kaunsa bataya tha aapne?
Executive: Telegram ad services aa raha hai.
Customer: Telegram ad service jaise hi aap apna buylead consume karenge na, aapko mail pe bhi contact detail aa jayega aur lead manager mein bhi aapko contact detail chala jayega. Hamesha ke liye rahega.
Executive: Sahi lead, sahi lead. Ye sahi lead kaha pe hai sir? Matlab man lijiye jo ye to sahi lead aati to samajh mein aata. Ye lead sahi aa hi nahi rahi hai na?
Customer: To ye isme aapka isiliye bol raha hu balance nahi kat raha isme. Ye lead jo hai customer, man lijiye mai mujhe customer samjhiye aap. Thik hai? Maine ek product search kiya, koi bhi product laga lijiye, let suppose chair search kiya maine. Aur aap kuch aur deal kar rahe ho, aas paas ka kuch deal kar rahe ho, maine aapki company pe click karke message dal diya.
To usme hum customer ko rok thodi na payenge sir abhi. Agar aapko ha continuously koi category remove karwana hoga na, abhi to jaise aapka start hi hua hai just.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Kuch samay aapko use karte hue ho jayega ki is tarike ka buylead mai use kar raha hu, ye mera product hai, to usi accordingly aapko aana shuru ho jayega un location se hi aur us product se related hi sir. Baki aisa product vaise hamare paas remove karne ka bhi option hota hai, location bhi aur categories bhi. Wo bhi remove ho jayega.
Executive: Ek aur problem hai ji, profile aap meri open karenge na, to aapke four years dikha raha hai. Wo four years galat hai na?
Customer: Nahi, wo mai batata hu. Aapne previous kuch hi time pehle ya char saal pehle apne apne isi number se create kiya hoga account. Sirf create kiya hoga, paisa nahi diya hoga.
Executive: Accha accha.
Customer: To isiliye wo char saal purana dikha raha hai aur usme aapko isiliye hum benefit dete hai aapko ye taki jab koi customer aaye to usko aisa lage ki nayi registered hai. Kyuki fir nayi company ko customer trust nahi karta hai. To aapko usme benefit hi de raha hai IndiaMART ki char saal dikha raha hai. Char saal ho gaye company ko. Basically aapko hum old supplier dikha rahe hai IndiaMART pe customer ke samne. Taki aapko aur visibility mile, customer aapko trust karke aapke sath mein deal karne mein interested ho jaye.
Executive: To iske liye direct mein phone kar sakta hu, baat kar sakta hu?
Customer: Kaise sir?
Executive: Jo hamare paas mail pe number aayi hai.
Customer: Ha, mail ye number aap dekhiye mail pe bhi aayenge aur ek mobile application mein lead manager milega sir aapko option. Ye waha bhi jayenge to aap dono mein se jaha aap comfortable ho, mail se dekhna mail se kar lijiye. Otherwise lead manager ke through to hum aapko option bhi dete hai na reply karne ka jaise WhatsApp pe reply hota hai na, waha se aap reply kar sakte hai, message message kar sakte ho. Mail se to aapko chalo dial hi karna padega number. Wo dial to karna bhi hai chalo customer se baat karne ke liye. Lekin lead manager ke through karenge to jyada sahi rahega kyuki waha se reply waha bhi dikhega aapko, customer ko bhi dikhega aur uske baad aap customer ko. Thik thik thik thik.
Customer: Thik hai aur Vineet, Vineet ka number aap save kariye sir. Aapke account manager hai na jo. Ji aapka call miss ho gaya tha to ek ticket open ho gaya. Ticket basically complaint consider karte hai. Abhi jo jaise maine aapko call kiya to aapko mera number nahi ja raha hai, ye virtual number ja raha hai aapko.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai? To ye 9696 pe call karna ho, matlab wo complaint number hota hai. Hamara complaint number alag hai aur aapke account manager ka alag hai. Lekin aapko kuch bhi problem issue hota hai, aap pehle apne account manager ko batayenge. Agar unse resolve nahi hota to mai baat karunga. Mere se resolve nahi hota to aap 9696 ya customer care pe complaint karenge ki ye mera issue tha, ye resolve nahi ho raha.
Executive: Okay okay sir okay.
Customer: Thik hai? Ab jaise ye aapka abhi aise hi open ho gaya kyuki aapka incoming call aapka jo pehle jiske jinhone aap se liya hai na payment liya hai, unhone aapka call receive nahi kiya hoga kiya tha. To wo ticket open ho gaya aap complaint. Lekin abhi aapke aapko account manager assign ho gaye. Wo person to call receive nahi karenge abhi to abhi to Vineet ki responsibility hai aapko jo bhi problem issue aayega resolve karne ka. To aapko Vineet ko karna hai call aur Vineet ka number aap note kariye.
Executive: Hai hai sir.
Customer: Aapko jo Vineet call kar raha tha wo usko abhi call aapko call pe jo number ja raha hoga na Vineet ka dusra ja raha hoga, aap uska personal number save kariye.
Executive: Personal number, personal number aa gaya sir. Aa gaya, maine save kar diya.
Customer: Kiya na Vineet share aapne sir ke sath mein. Thik hai, Vineet ne kar diya unhone share aapke sath mein apna number.
Executive: Thik.
Customer: Thik hai? Aap unko call karenge agar unse nahi resolve ho pata hai, aap bol dijiye ki meri Pankaj ji se baat karwa dijiye, Vineet mere se connect karwa dega. To abhi jo complaint aapke paas wo halaki wo complaint nahi tha lekin hum complaint consider karte hai agar koi aapka phone nahi bhi utha raha usko bhi.
Executive: Thik thik. Okay.
Customer: Thik hai? To aapko ek mail jayega usko bhi reply IndiaMART kar dijiyega sir.
Executive: Ji, 100%.
Customer: Thik hai? Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Profile shows incorrect tenure (4 years).



Resolution:

- Explained how buyleads and customer numbers are provided.

- Explained how to add YouTube, Facebook links to catalog.

- Explained how to remove unwanted categories and locations.

- Explained the reason for the 4-year tenure display.

- Provided Vineet's (account manager) direct contact number.

- Explained escalation process if issues are unresolved.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to contact Vineet for further assistance.

- Customer to reply to the email from IndiaMART.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, account manager, telegram ads, catalog
